content.question: The number of cells in a culture is known to double every <math alttext="5"><mn>5</mn></math> hours. There are <math alttext="37"><mn>37</mn></math> cells at time <math alttext="t equals 0"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> hours. Which of the following is an appropriate model for <math alttext="N open parentheses t close parentheses"><mi>N</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></math>, the number of cells in the culture at time <math alttext="t"><mi>t</mi></math> hours?

choices.label: <math alttext="N open parentheses t close parentheses equals 37 plus 2 to the power of open parentheses t divided by 5 close parentheses end exponent"><mi>N</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>37</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></math>

<math alttext="N open parentheses t close parentheses equals 37 plus 2 to the power of open parentheses 5 t close parentheses end exponent"><mi>N</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>37</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></msup></math>

<math alttext="N open parentheses t close parentheses equals 37 times 2 to the power of open parentheses t divided by 5 close parentheses end exponent"><mi>N</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>37</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></math>

<math alttext="N open parentheses t close parentheses equals 37 times 2 to the power of open parentheses 5 t close parentheses end exponent"><mi>N</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>37</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></msup></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="N open parentheses t close parentheses equals 37 times 2 to the power of open parentheses t divided by 5 close parentheses end exponent"><mi>N</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>37</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></math>

topic.text: 2.5: Exponential Function Context and Data Modeling

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
